text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Plans for future training……is it?

It was a few days after signing the contract with 
Dream Journey. In preparation for her debut, I had 
gathered some materials and we were discussing training plans.
choice_data_list: Let's talk and decide on some things!

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I apologize. Honestly……I didn't think I'd get 
a trainer. I always managed my own training.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Please don't mind it. I would like to hear Trainer-san's 
thoughts though. I suppose I'll scrap my current plans――
choice_data_list: Wait, let me see them first!
Wait, let me see them first!

text_block_list.text:
When I saw her plans……I was at a loss for words. 
It was meticulously put together――It was so 
perfect, there was nothing I could really add.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I analyzed all of my training data up to this point, and 
then compared it to other Uma Musume who had similar data. 
Using that I set my goals for the next three years.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
The royal road……in other words, the 『Satsuki Sho』 『Japan 
Derby』 and 『Kikka Sho』, aiming for the Triple Crown would 
be my main goal. And medium and long for my senior year.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
My running style consumes a lot of stamina, so my 
training menu will mostly focus on endurance――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……I'm sorry for rambling. You probably have many concerns. 
Please, I'd like to hear your opinions, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……I suppose even for Trainer-san it's hard to 
answer so suddenly. I'll let you hold on to it, 
so please take a look. And I'll excuse myself now……

There was one thing I definitely wanted to 
confirm today. It was something that a Trainer 
and Uma Musume should know about each other――
choice_data_list: I want to hear what your dream is
I want to hear what your dream is

text_block_list.text:
I want to be a Derby Uma Musume, I want to leave my name 
in history, I just want to win……they all ran with some 
goal in mind. What "dream" is most important to her?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
…………………… 
I want to see the "End of a journey"

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
That's my dream. What I……want most. 
There……lies what I want most――

text_block_list.name: Big Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
――……it's decided then. We'll take care of the "little 
sister". We'll have the honor student "Onee-chan" 
take responsibility. We'll see how tough she is then.

text_block_list.name: Sketchy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
What happens when it gets your precious family involved……huh? 
Hahaa, I'm looking forward to seeing how she reacts!

After parting with Dream Journey, I remembered something I 
forgot to mention. It would have been fine to use LANE but, 
since I had the chance, I'd go check on her committee――

Orfevre……even though she hasn't debuted, she was an 
Uma Musume that was already showing great promise. 
She had an overwhelming aura, a strong presence.

How long was I just standing silently staring at her? I couldn't 
even move under the amount of pressure she gave off……

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ……It's Aneue's scent.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Why is Aneue's scent coming off of someone like you? 
Answer me.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
――Or. 
It's fine.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
That person is my trainer. We were together just a 
short while ago, so maybe that's why they have my scent.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I'm Or's older sister. 
――This proud, beautiful little sister……see?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
……………… 
So you're Aneue's……

I was a little troubled and looked to Dream Journey 
for help, but she just gave me her usual gentle smile.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Or, just leave it at that. Your gaze is quite 
precious. Aren't you looking at the wrong person?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
By the way, were you sleeping in here again? The air conditioning 
doesn't work very well……was it comfortable enough?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
It wasn't bad. 
However……there isn't enough sunlight.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Maybe I should arrange for a wider window. 
What? It'll be resolved soon. Anything else, Or? 
If there's anything troubling you, just tell me.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's right……the temperature has been rising lately. 
Be mindful of any annoying flies that might appear.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
If you start to feel uncomfortable, just let me 
know right away. So that doesn't happen, I 
suppose I'll have to thoroughly clean this place……

Her calm tone was just like an older sister 
caring for her younger sister. It didn't seem 
strange……however……for some reason I was on edge――
choice_data_list: ……You really care about your younger sister.
……You really care about your younger sister.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Of course. 
Family is more important than anything, after all.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
My father, mother, little sister……are all my pride. I always 
want them to be happy and comfortable……that's my wish.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
By the way……Trainer-san, did you have business 
with me? Or, just wait a little bit. I'm sure 
it's something really important. ……Right?

The door slammed shut behind me. I'm the only 
one that left. However……I kind of felt like it 
was an atmosphere where I shouldn't say anything.

Dream Journey, the girl I had signed a contract with, 
was an Uma Musume that was highly capable, an honor 
student, polite, and very family-oriented. However……――

I kind of felt there was something about her perfume. It 
was a scent that, for some reason, felt almost nostalgic……――

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
――……Aneue. That perfume. 
How long have you been wearing it……?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Well……just when did I start? 
By the way, Or……what do you think of my trainer?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
I can't comprehend it. Just why would you choose that? 
Second-rate, unsophisticated. Unsuitable for Aneue.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
But that's precisely why, Or. You always get 
straight to the point……as expected. Your 
honesty is something that's quite rare.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Second-rate, unsophisticated……furthermore, preparations for 
the journey are complete. ――The journey to reach "Anego"……
